nodes.bodyText: Maybe we should disable this by default since we want to make it easy for people to get up and running without requiring any config? Or can we set replicas=0 to effectively disable?
replicas defaults to 0 in deployment.yaml when replicas is not set in values

Eh? I was referring to the docker-compose file. The rule is the docker compose should be runnable as is without any config.
Please undo deployment change.
Can you test if we can lower this? It should start up much quicker than grpc which requires redis and postgresql.

nodes.bodyText: This if/else can be removed. Only reason it's there for gRPC is because it has an HPA and the HPA manages the value of the replicas field. Can simply be replicas: {{ .Values.replicas }}. Please also put a default of 1 in the values.yaml.
